Hello! During import there are problems with auctions, or rather with their naming. We contacted bidspirit technical support and they confirmed the issues. We need permission from you so that we can make the necessary changes to your auction house https://soaresmendonca.bidspirit.com/ to solve this problem.

Здравствуйте! Во время импорта возникают проблемы с аукционами а точнее с их именование. Мы связались с технической поддержкой bidspirit и они подтвердили проблемы. Нам требуется разрешение от Вас что бы мы смогли внести нужные изменения в вашем аукционном доме https://soaresmendonca.bidspirit.com/ для решения этой проблемы.
I'll check everything now.
Сheck everything now.
Сейчас всё проверю.

Hello! Let's get back to the question about auctions for the client https://soaresmendonca.bidspirit.com/. I do not have access to his bidspirit account, so I only show what came via import. Solved some of the problems with the indexes of auctions in import. But a couple of problems remain. 1) The client has 4 "Online" auctions, i.e. "Auction number" is not checked for uniqueness on the bidspirit side. See attachment 1. The problem with this auction is that when we request it from the API to get its lots, we receive a response: {"success":false,"errorMessage":"4 entries found, only 1 is allowed","errorCode":"DUPLICATE"} 2) This client has auctions with a non-numeric "Auction number" value. See attachment 2. When I tried to create an auction in bidspirit without specifying or entering symbolic values in the "Auction number" field, I got errors when saving. 1) Error: Auction number cannot be empty because it might be used as a key by external api 2) Auction number must be a number
When I tried to create an auction in bidspirit without specifying or entering symbolic values in the "Auction number" field, I got errors when saving.
When I tried to create an auction in bidspirit without specifying or entering symbolic values ​​in the "Auction number" field, I got errors when saving.
Сам же когда пытался создать аукцион в bidspirit не указывая или вводя символьные значения в поле "Auction number" получал ошибки при сохранении.
